name: Pando v3 PHYSBONES UPDATE - VRChat/Vtuber Avatar
name_original: Pando v3 PHYSBONES UPDATE - VRChat/Vtuber Avatar
description:
Join the Pando Discord community server for guides, reporting bugs and chillin': https://discord.gg/NK4kpXfNsv

If you'd like the verified buyer role (gives access to the #verified-buyer channel) DM Skibbles with proof of purchase

PHYSBONES/QUEST UPDATE RELEASED!

Changelog:

  • Quest compatibility
  • Physbones
  • Tongue and snoot pulling/stretching expressions
  • Longer leg version for fullbody
  • Two extra expressions (finger gun/finger gun or peace/peace on both hands
  • Tail controls +Tail size slider
  • 60+ Body/face shapes
  • Hue slider

Includes .blend/Substance Painter files for texturing and model edits
